name: Shine Brighter
description:
====================== PLAY SHINE BRIGHTER ===================

Help Starry shine brighter ! Explore its universe, talk to strange people and stars, solve puzzles and help it grow !

====================== CONTROLS =============================

Left click to select an option and a character.

Right click to cancel the selection....and that's all !

=========================MISC==========================

The game was made in 5 days for BlackThornProd GameJam 2021 !
